docs.lead_paragraph: How the children of the hundreds of thousands of Russian emigres, and a host of the younger exiles themselves, are being educated in their native tongue and culture, principally in order to prevent their being denationalized and weaned away from "Mother Russia" by a foreign environment, was brought out in detail at a recent conference of the Bureau for Russian Elementary and Academic Education Abroad, held in Prague.

headline.main: EXILES TRY TO KEEP CHILDREN RUSSIANS; Fear of Denationalization Is Voiced at Emigres' Conference in Prague.

docs.abstract: Russian Patriotic Soc of Gt Britain, which backs Grand Duke Cyril, attacks Paris group supporting him
